data.actual_result: Nothing happens to the message, it sends as it was before trying to edit
data.expected_result: Either shouldn't be able to edit the message while sending, or message gets edited
data.short_description: Able to edit a message while it's sending, even though nothing happens
data.steps_to_repro: - Make sure you have a connection where messages take a few seconds to send, but is still stable connection - Type a message and send it - While the message is sending, long press and tap "Edit message" - Edit the message and press save - Check the message once it sends to see if any changes were made
